name: ml-search-result
description: Fetch search result from ML and save to json format.
author: Hudson Van-Dal <vandal.hudson@gmail.com>

scripts.start: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec "rimraf dist && tsc && npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 && serverless offline start"
scripts.start_old: rimraf dist && tsc && npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 && serverless offline start
